name: Giraffe - A Casual Game
description:
A short game experience designed for mobile. Grow your giraffe's neck as high as you can without toppling over or hitting anything on your way up. Keep growing and beat your previous high score.

Giraffe is the first in a series of short games made in 6 week development sprints. These games are designed to focus on engaging and simple gameplay, providing replayability with a small number of deeper mechanics. Feedback is welcome and much appreciated.

This project uses public domain assets from the following users:

  • KenneyNL
  • GDQuest
  • RavenTale
  • VOiD1
